LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.0.label: alcohol warmth
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.0.description: I just feel a bit more relaxed after that drink. That's good.
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.1.label: quite inebriated
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.1.description: I'm a bit wobbly! And this is quite enjoyable.
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.2.label: drunk
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.2.description: I feel so uninhibited and unafraid! This is a great time!
LanguageData.Inebriated.stages.3.label: hammered
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.0.label: mild hangover
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.1.label: serious hangover
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.1.description: My head hurts from all that liquor.
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.2.label: pounding hangover
LanguageData.Hungover.stages.2.description: It feels like a gaggle of geese are pecking at my skull.
LanguageData.AlcoholWithdrawal.stages.1.label: alcohol withdrawal
LanguageData.AlcoholWithdrawal.stages.1.description: Feeling shaky. Everything pisses me off. I keep thinking of drinking.
LanguageData.AmbrosiaHigh.stages.0.label: ambrosia warmth
LanguageData.AmbrosiaHigh.stages.0.description: That ambrosia makes me feel more relaxed, and gives me energy at the same time.
LanguageData.AmbrosiaWithdrawal.stages.1.label: ambrosia withdrawal
LanguageData.AmbrosiaWithdrawal.stages.1.description: I feel heavy and cold all the time. I never thought I'd want a piece of fruit so much.
LanguageData.GoJuiceHigh.stages.0.label: high on go-juice
LanguageData.GoJuiceHigh.stages.0.description: I feel pumped but steady. I am the bullet in flight, ready to cut through you.
LanguageData.GoJuiceWithdrawal.stages.1.label: go-juice withdrawal
LanguageData.GoJuiceWithdrawal.stages.1.description: I'm all fuzzy and can't think straight. My limbs feel heavy, I'm tired and hungry, everything hurts. And why won't my eyes focus properly?
LanguageData.FlakeHigh.stages.0.label: high on flake
LanguageData.PsychiteTeaHigh.stages.0.label: psychite tea
LanguageData.PsychiteTeaHigh.stages.0.description: Drinking that tea made me feel great. I love having this energy!
LanguageData.YayoHigh.stages.0.label: high on yayo
LanguageData.PsychiteWithdrawal.stages.1.label: psychite withdrawal
LanguageData.PsychiteWithdrawal.stages.1.description: God I'm tired. Everything's so slow and boring. Especially me.
LanguageData.SmokeleafHigh.stages.0.label: high on smokeleaf
LanguageData.SmokeleafWithdrawal.stages.1.label: smokeleaf withdrawal
LanguageData.SmokeleafWithdrawal.stages.1.description: I really wish I could smoke. I feel jittery, and my gut has that anxious sensation all the time.
LanguageData.WakeUpWithdrawal.stages.1.label: wake-up withdrawal
LanguageData.WakeUpWithdrawal.stages.1.description: I feel all fuzzy and unfocused. And I'm so tired.
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.0.label: sky-high expectations
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.0.description: I should be made very comfortable here.
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.1.label: high expectations
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.1.description: There's no reason I shouldn't have the things I want.
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.2.label: moderate expectations
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.2.description: I can't expect to be totally pampered.
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.3.label: low expectations
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.4.label: very low expectations
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.4.description: I need to keep myself strong to survive.
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.5.label: extremely low expectations
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.5.description: I'd better steel myself to survive.
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.6.label: noble expectations
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.6.description: I am above the little people and should be made happy every moment.
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.7.label: royal expectations
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.7.description: My majesty... I can hardly believe it myself. A moment's discomfort is below me.
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.8.label: elite expectations
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.8.description: I shouldn't have to endure any inconveniences that distract me from my important role.
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.9.label: supreme expectations
LanguageData.Expectations.stages.9.description: My importance here is uncontested, so my comfort must be a critical priority for my people.
LanguageData.AteNutrientPasteMeal.stages.0.label: ate nutrient paste meal
LanguageData.AteNutrientPasteMeal.stages.0.descriptio: I had to eat a disgusting, tasteless meal. I know it keeps you alive, but nobody wants to swallow that glop.
LanguageData.AnestheticHigh.stages.1.label: anesthetic wooziness
LanguageData.AnestheticHigh.stages.1.description: I feel so heavy... and so relaxed...
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.0.label: justified execution
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.0.description: A guilty prisoner or guest was executed. It was justified, but still sad.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.1.label: someone was euthanized
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.1.description: A prisoner or guest was euthanized. It was humane, but still sad.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.2.label: someone was executed
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.2.description: A prisoner or guest was killed in cold blood. It seemed a bit evil.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.3.label: someone was organ-murdered
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted.stages.3.description: A prisoner or guest died because the colony took body parts from him. It's horrible.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.0.label: justified execution of colonist
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.0.descriptio: A guilty colonist was executed. It was justified, but still sad.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.1.label: colonist euthanized
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.1.descriptio: A colonist was euthanized. It was humane, but still sad.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.2.label: colonist executed
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.2.descriptio: A colonist was killed in cold blood. It seemed a bit evil.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.3.label: colonist organ-harvested
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted.stages.3.descriptio: A colonist died because someone took body parts from him. It's horrible.
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerDiedInnocent.stages.0.label: innocent prisoner died
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerDiedInnocent.stages.0.descri: One of our prisoners died despite being harmless. We should be able to take care of our prisoners. If we wanted them dead, we could have at least conducted an orderly execution rather than permit that barbarism.
LanguageData.KnowColonistDied.stages.0.label: colonist died
LanguageData.KnowColonistDied.stages.0.description: One of our people died. We should be able to take care of our people.
LanguageData.BondedAnimalDied.stages.0.label: bonded animal {0} died
LanguageData.BondedAnimalDied.stages.0.description: Such a tender, unique animal. This universe is evil!
LanguageData.PawnWithGoodOpinionDied.stages.0.label: my friend {0} died
LanguageData.PawnWithGoodOpinionDied.stages.0.descrip: Such a wonderful person, gone forever. The universe gets darker every day.
LanguageData.PawnWithBadOpinionDied.stages.0.label: my rival {0} died
LanguageData.PawnWithBadOpinionDied.stages.0.descript: Serves them right. At least there's some justice in this world.
LanguageData.MySonDied.stages.0.label: my son {0} died
LanguageData.MySonDied.stages.0.description: My son is dead. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyDaughterDied.stages.0.label: my daughter {0} died
LanguageData.MyDaughterDied.stages.0.description: My daughter is dead. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyHusbandDied.stages.0.label: my husband {0} died
LanguageData.MyHusbandDied.stages.0.description: My husband is dead. I am alone.
LanguageData.MyWifeDied.stages.0.label: my wife {0} died
LanguageData.MyWifeDied.stages.0.description: My wife is dead. I am alone.
LanguageData.MyFianceDied.stages.0.label: my fiance {0} died
LanguageData.MyFianceDied.stages.0.description: My fiance died. Such a man... my future is gone.
LanguageData.MyFianceeDied.stages.0.label: my fiancée {0} died
LanguageData.MyFianceeDied.stages.0.description: My fiancée died. Such a woman... my future is gone.
LanguageData.MyLoverDied.stages.0.label: my lover {0} died
LanguageData.MyLoverDied.stages.0.description: My lover died. I am so alone.
LanguageData.MyBrotherDied.stages.0.label: my brother {0} died
LanguageData.MyBrotherDied.stages.0.description: My brother died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MySisterDied.stages.0.label: my sister {0} died
LanguageData.MySisterDied.stages.0.description: My sister died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyGrandchildDied.stages.0.label: my grandchild {0} died
LanguageData.MyGrandchildDied.stages.0.description: My grandchild died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyFatherDied.stages.0.label: my father {0} died
LanguageData.MyFatherDied.stages.0.description: My father died. He's gone forever.
LanguageData.MyMotherDied.stages.0.label: my mother {0} died
LanguageData.MyMotherDied.stages.0.description: My mother died. She's gone forever.
LanguageData.MyNieceDied.stages.0.label: my niece {0} died
LanguageData.MyNieceDied.stages.0.description: My niece died. Such a wonderful child.
LanguageData.MyNephewDied.stages.0.label: my nephew {0} died
LanguageData.MyNephewDied.stages.0.description: My nephew died. Such a wonderful child.
LanguageData.MyHalfSiblingDied.stages.0.label: my half-sibling {0} died
LanguageData.MyHalfSiblingDied.stages.0.description: My half-sibling died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyAuntDied.stages.0.label: my aunt {0} died
LanguageData.MyUncleDied.stages.0.label: my uncle {0} died
LanguageData.MyGrandparentDied.stages.0.label: my grandparent {0} died
LanguageData.MyCousinDied.stages.0.label: my cousin {0} died
LanguageData.MyCousinDied.stages.0.description: My cousin died. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.MyKinDied.stages.0.label: my kin {0} died
LanguageData.DebugBad.stages.0.label: debug bad thought
LanguageData.DebugGood.stages.0.label: debug good thought
LanguageData.AteLavishMeal.stages.0.label: ate lavish meal
LanguageData.AteLavishMeal.stages.0.description: That lavish meal was amazing. It nourished my body and my soul.
LanguageData.AteFineMeal.stages.0.label: ate fine meal
LanguageData.AteFineMeal.stages.0.description: I ate a really tasty fine meal. Yum!
LanguageData.AteRawFood.stages.0.label: ate raw food
LanguageData.AteRawFood.stages.0.description: I had to eat raw food. We should be cooking that kind of food before eating it. We're not animals.
LanguageData.AteKibble.stages.0.label: ate kibble
LanguageData.AteKibble.stages.0.description: I had to eat animal kibble. It's like I don't get to be human any more.
LanguageData.AteCorpse.stages.0.label: ate corpse
LanguageData.AteCorpse.stages.0.description: I had to eat the flesh of a dead creature without even butchering or cooking it.
LanguageData.AteHumanlikeMeatDirect.stages.0.label: raw cannibalism
LanguageData.AteHumanlikeMeatDirect.stages.0.descript: I ate the meat of another human, raw, like an animal. This is a nightmare.
I ate the meat of another human, raw, like an animal. It was so... succulent.
LanguageData.AteHumanlikeMeatAsIngredient.stages.0.de: I ate a meal made from the meat of another human. This is horrible.
LanguageData.AteHumanlikeMeatAsIngredientCannibal.sta: I ate a meal made from the meat of another human. So pleasurable. If only I had some fava beans and a nice chianti.
LanguageData.AteInsectMeatDirect.stages.0.label: ate insect meat
LanguageData.AteInsectMeatDirect.stages.0.description: I ate some gray, slimy insect meat. It was, possibly, the most disgusting thing I've ever tasted.
LanguageData.AteInsectMeatAsIngredient.stages.0.label: ate cooked insect meat
LanguageData.AteInsectMeatAsIngredient.stages.0.descr: I ate a meal cooked from gray, slimy insect meat. The seasoning partly covered the taste, but there were glands and fluid pockets in there that I can't identify.
LanguageData.AteRottenFood.stages.0.label: ate rotten food
LanguageData.AteRottenFood.stages.0.description: I ate some disgusting, putrid food. It was melting in my mouth - but not in a good way.
LanguageData.GotMarried.stages.0.label: got married to {0}
LanguageData.GotMarried.stages.0.description: I got married! It's so wonderful to be starting a new life together!
LanguageData.AttendedWedding.stages.0.label: attended wedding
LanguageData.AttendedWedding.stages.0.description: It was great to see two people come together to build a future like that.
LanguageData.AttendedParty.stages.0.label: attended party
LanguageData.AttendedParty.stages.0.description: I had a good time at that party.
LanguageData.AttendedConcert.stages.0.label: attended concert
LanguageData.AttendedConcert.stages.0.description: I enjoyed listening to that performance.
LanguageData.HeldConcert.stages.0.label: held concert
LanguageData.HeldConcert.stages.0.description: They loved me. They really loved me.
LanguageData.TerribleSpeech.stages.0.label: terrible speech
LanguageData.TerribleSpeech.stages.0.description: That speech was atrocious. It made me realize how little hope we really have.
LanguageData.UninspiringSpeech.stages.0.label: uninspiring speech
LanguageData.UninspiringSpeech.stages.0.description: That speech was more awkward than inspiring. If that's who we're listening to, I'm worried.
LanguageData.EncouragingSpeech.stages.0.label: encouraging speech
LanguageData.EncouragingSpeech.stages.0.description: That speech made me feel like we have a solid path forward.
LanguageData.InspirationalSpeech.stages.0.label: inspirational speech
LanguageData.InspirationalSpeech.stages.0.description: That speech was moving emotionally and intellectually. I am filled with purpose.
LanguageData.ColonistLost.stages.0.label: colonist lost
LanguageData.ColonistLost.stages.0.description: We just lost someone of our colony in a tragic way.
LanguageData.BondedAnimalReleased.stages.0.label: bonded animal {0} released
LanguageData.BondedAnimalReleased.stages.0.descriptio: Such a tender, unique animal. Why did it have to go?
LanguageData.BondedAnimalLost.stages.0.label: bonded animal {0} lost
LanguageData.BondedAnimalLost.stages.0.description: Such a tender, unique animal. This universe is evil!
LanguageData.PawnWithGoodOpinionLost.stages.0.label: my friend {0} lost
LanguageData.PawnWithGoodOpinionLost.stages.0.descrip: Such a wonderful person, lost. The universe gets darker every day.
LanguageData.PawnWithBadOpinionLost.stages.0.label: my rival {0} lost
LanguageData.PawnWithBadOpinionLost.stages.0.descript: Serves them right. At least there's some justice in this world.
LanguageData.MySonLost.stages.0.label: my son {0} lost
LanguageData.MySonLost.stages.0.description: My son has gone lost. I hope he will get back to us someday.
LanguageData.MyDaughterLost.stages.0.label: my daughter {0} lost
LanguageData.MyDaughterLost.stages.0.description: My daughter has gone lost. I hope she will get back to us someday.
LanguageData.MyHusbandLost.stages.0.label: my husband {0} lost
LanguageData.MyHusbandLost.stages.0.description: My husband has gone lost. I hope he will get back to us someday.
LanguageData.MyWifeLost.stages.0.label: my wife {0} lost
LanguageData.MyWifeLost.stages.0.description: My wife has gone lost. I hope she will get back to us someday.
LanguageData.MyFianceLost.stages.0.label: my fiance {0} lost
LanguageData.MyFianceLost.stages.0.description: My fiance has gone lost. I hope he will get back to us someday.
LanguageData.MyFianceeLost.stages.0.label: my fiancée {0} lost
LanguageData.MyFianceeLost.stages.0.description: My fiancée has gone lost. I hope she will get back to us someday.
LanguageData.MyLoverLost.stages.0.label: my lover {0} lost
LanguageData.MyLoverLost.stages.0.description: My lover has gone lost. I hope he will get back to us someday.
LanguageData.MyBrotherLost.stages.0.label: my brother {0} lost
LanguageData.MyBrotherLost.stages.0.description: My brother has gone lost. I hope he will get back to us someday.
LanguageData.MySisterLost.stages.0.label: my sister {0} lost
LanguageData.MySisterLost.stages.0.description: My sister has gone lost. I hope she will get back to us someday.
LanguageData.MyGrandchildLost.stages.0.label: my grandchild {0} lost
LanguageData.MyGrandchildLost.stages.0.description: My grandchild has gone lost. I hope they will get back to us someday.
LanguageData.MyFatherLost.stages.0.label: my father {0} lost
LanguageData.MyFatherLost.stages.0.description: My father has gone lost. I hope he will get back to us someday.
LanguageData.MyMotherLost.stages.0.label: my mother {0} lost
LanguageData.MyMotherLost.stages.0.description: My mother has gone lost. I hope she will get back to us someday.
LanguageData.MyNieceLost.stages.0.label: my niece {0} lost
LanguageData.MyNieceLost.stages.0.description: My niece has gone lost. I hope she will get back to us someday.
LanguageData.MyNephewLost.stages.0.label: my nephew {0} lost
LanguageData.MyNephewLost.stages.0.description: My nephew has gone lost. I hope he will get back to us someday.
LanguageData.MyHalfSiblingLost.stages.0.label: my half-sibling {0} lost
LanguageData.MyAuntLost.stages.0.label: my aunt {0} lost
LanguageData.MyAuntLost.stages.0.description: My aunt has gone lost. I hope she will get back to us someday.
LanguageData.MyUncleLost.stages.0.label: my uncle {0} lost
LanguageData.MyUncleLost.stages.0.description: My uncle has gone lost. I hope he will get back to us someday.
LanguageData.MyGrandparentLost.stages.0.label: my grandparent {0} lost
LanguageData.MyCousinLost.stages.0.label: my cousin {0} lost
LanguageData.MyKinLost.stages.0.label: my kin {0} lost
LanguageData.AteWithoutTable.stages.0.label: ate without table
LanguageData.AteWithoutTable.stages.0.description: I had to eat a meal off the ground. Can't we get a table around here?
LanguageData.SleepDisturbed.stages.0.label: disturbed sleep
LanguageData.SleepDisturbed.stages.0.description: I was disturbed during sleep by people moving around nearby. A private room would solve this.
LanguageData.NewColonyOptimism.stages.0.label: initial optimism
LanguageData.NewColonyOptimism.stages.0.description: It's a tough situation, but I'm excited to be founding a new settlement.
LanguageData.NewColonyHope.stages.0.label: initial hope
LanguageData.NewColonyHope.stages.0.description: I'm getting used to this, but it's still an exciting new situation. I hope this works out...
LanguageData.SleptOutside.stages.0.label: slept outside
LanguageData.SleptOutside.stages.0.description: I had to sleep outdoors without any protection from the elements.
LanguageData.SleptOnGround.stages.0.label: slept on ground
LanguageData.SleptOnGround.stages.0.description: I had to sleep on the ground like an animal.
LanguageData.SleptInCold.stages.0.label: slept in the cold
LanguageData.SleptInCold.stages.0.description: I had to sleep in the cold. We really need some heaters.
LanguageData.SleptInHeat.stages.0.label: slept in the heat
LanguageData.SleptInHeat.stages.0.description: I had to sleep in unbearable heat. Can't we have air conditioning?
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerSold.stages.0.label: prisoner sold
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerSold.stages.0.description: This colony sold a prisoner into slavery. That's a worrying thought.
LanguageData.FreedFromSlavery.stages.0.label: freed from slavery
LanguageData.FreedFromSlavery.stages.0.description: I have been freed from slavery. I'm so thankful!
LanguageData.ReleasedHealthyPrisoner.stages.0.label: prisoner released
LanguageData.ReleasedHealthyPrisoner.stages.0.descrip: We released a healthy prisoner. It feels good to know we even treat prisoners well.
LanguageData.HarvestedOrgan_Bloodlust.stages.0.label: bloodlust organ harvested
LanguageData.HarvestedOrgan_Bloodlust.stages.0.descri: Extracting the flesh from their bodies is so bloody and satisfying.
LanguageData.KnowGuestOrganHarvested.stages.0.label: someone's organ harvested
LanguageData.KnowGuestOrganHarvested.stages.0.descrip: The colony took body parts from a guest or prisoner. It's horrible, breaking someone down for parts when they have no choice.
LanguageData.KnowColonistOrganHarvested.stages.0.desc: Someone took body parts from a colonist. It's horrible, breaking someone down for parts when they have no choice.
LanguageData.MyOrganHarvested.stages.0.label: my organ harvested
LanguageData.MyOrganHarvested.stages.0.description: The colony harvested body parts from me! They're breaking me down like an old engine!
LanguageData.WasImprisoned.stages.0.label: was imprisoned
LanguageData.WasImprisoned.stages.0.description: The colony had me in jail for a while, like a caged animal.
LanguageData.Catharsis.stages.0.label: catharsis
LanguageData.Catharsis.stages.0.description: It felt good to finally unbottle my feelings.
LanguageData.Nuzzled.stages.0.label: nuzzled
LanguageData.KnowBuriedInSarcophagus.stages.0.label: buried in sarcophagus
LanguageData.KnowBuriedInSarcophagus.stages.0.descrip: This colony buried someone in an ornamented sarcophagus. May their soul rest in peace.
LanguageData.SoakingWet.stages.0.label: soaking wet
LanguageData.ButcheredHumanlikeCorpse.stages.0.label: I butchered humanlike
LanguageData.ButcheredHumanlikeCorpse.stages.0.descri: I butchered someone up like an animal.
LanguageData.KnowButcheredHumanlikeCorpse.stages.0.de: We butchered someone up like an animal.
LanguageData.ObservedLayingCorpse.stages.0.label: observed corpse
LanguageData.ObservedLayingCorpse.stages.0.descriptio: I saw a dead body laying on the ground. It was disturbing.
LanguageData.ObservedLayingRottingCorpse.stages.0.des: I saw a rotting corpse laying on the ground. It was disgusting.
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathAlly.stages.0.label: witnessed ally's death
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathAlly.stages.0.description: I saw one of my people die. They were alive one moment, and dead the next.
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathNonAlly.stages.0.label: witnessed outsider's death
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathNonAlly.stages.0.descripti: I saw someone die. They were alive one moment, and dead the next.
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathFamily.stages.0.label: witnessed family member's death
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathFamily.stages.0.descriptio: I saw a member of my family die. My own flesh and blood...
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathBloodlust.stages.0.label: witnessed death with bloodlust
LanguageData.WitnessedDeathBloodlust.stages.0.descrip: I saw someone die! That was intense!
LanguageData.KilledHumanlikeBloodlust.stages.0.label: killed someone
LanguageData.KilledHumanlikeBloodlust.stages.0.descri: I killed someone! What a rush!
LanguageData.DefeatedHostileFactionLeader.stages.0.de: They were leading efforts to destroy us, and I took them down!
LanguageData.DefeatedMechCluster.stages.0.label: defeated mech cluster
LanguageData.DefeatedMechCluster.stages.0.description: Blood beats metal, you damn machines!
LanguageData.DeniedJoining.stages.0.label: denied joining
LanguageData.DeniedJoining.stages.0.description: We just denied someone's request to join us. I hope they make it.
LanguageData.ColonistBanished.stages.0.label: colonist banished
LanguageData.ColonistBanished.stages.0.description: We just banished someone. I hope they make it, but I'm worried.
LanguageData.ColonistBanishedToDie.stages.0.label: colonist banished to death
LanguageData.ColonistBanishedToDie.stages.0.descripti: We banished someone in such a way that there's almost no way they'll survive.
LanguageData.PrisonerBanishedToDie.stages.0.label: prisoner banished to death
LanguageData.PrisonerBanishedToDie.stages.0.descripti: We banished a prisoner in such a way that there's almost no way they'll survive.
LanguageData.ColonyPrisonerEscaped.stages.0.label: Colonist prisoner escaped
LanguageData.ColonyPrisonerEscaped.stages.0.descripti: Can't we keep control of our own people? I feel like anything could happen to me here.
LanguageData.BondedAnimalBanished.stages.0.label: bonded animal {0} banished
LanguageData.FailedToRescueRelative.stages.0.label: failed to rescue {0}
LanguageData.FailedToRescueRelative.stages.0.descript: We had a chance to rescue my relative, and failed. I could have helped!
LanguageData.RescuedRelative.stages.0.label: rescued {0}
LanguageData.RescuedRelative.stages.0.description: We rescued one of my relatives. Finally, I can breathe a sigh of relief.
LanguageData.Rescued.stages.0.label: rescued
LanguageData.Rescued.stages.0.description: I was rescued! I almost thought I was done for back there. I'm so thankful.
LanguageData.OnDuty.stages.0.label: on duty
LanguageData.OnDuty.stages.0.description: I have a job to do.
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.3.label: decent dining room
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.3.descr: I ate my meal in a decent dining room.
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.4.label: slightly impressive dining room
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.4.descr: I ate my meal in a slightly impressive dining room.
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.5.label: somewhat impressive dining room
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.5.descr: I ate my meal in an impressive dining room.
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.6.label: very impressive dining room
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.6.descr: I ate my meal in a very impressive dining room.
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.7.label: extremely impressive dining room
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.7.descr: I ate my meal in an extremely impressive dining room. I could stay there forever.
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.8.label: unbelievably impressive dining room
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.8.descr: I ate my meal in an unbelievably impressive dining room. I could stay there forever.
LanguageData.AteInImpressiveDiningRoom.stages.9.label: wondrously impressive dining room

LanguageData.OpinionOfMyLover.stages.0.description: Being with them makes me feel this way.
LanguageData.BondedAnimalMaster.stages.0.label: {0}'s master
LanguageData.BondedAnimalMaster.stages.0.description: Being together with my bonded animal makes me feel better.
LanguageData.BondedAnimalMaster.stages.1.label: master of {0}
LanguageData.BondedAnimalMaster.stages.1.description: Being together with my bonded animals makes me feel better.
LanguageData.NotBondedAnimalMaster.stages.0.label: not {0}'s master
LanguageData.NotBondedAnimalMaster.stages.0.descripti: I should be together with my bonded animal.
LanguageData.NotBondedAnimalMaster.stages.1.label: not master of {0}
LanguageData.NotBondedAnimalMaster.stages.1.descripti: I should be together with my bonded animals.
LanguageData.WantToSleepWithSpouseOrLover.stages.0.de: I should be sleeping with a lover or spouse.
LanguageData.SharedBed.stages.0.label: sharing bed
LanguageData.SharedBed.stages.0.description: I have to share a bed with someone who I don't particularly want to.
LanguageData.ColonistLeftUnburied.stages.0.label: colonist left unburied
LanguageData.ColonistLeftUnburied.stages.0.descriptio: One of us died and we're just leaving them lying in the open. Nobody should be left like that. People deserve a decent burial.
LanguageData.Naked.stages.0.label: naked
LanguageData.Pain.stages.0.label: minor pain
LanguageData.Pain.stages.1.label: serious pain
LanguageData.Pain.stages.2.label: intense pain
LanguageData.Pain.stages.2.description: Make it stop... make it stop... make it stop...
LanguageData.Pain.stages.3.label: mind-shattering pain
LanguageData.PsychicEmanatorSoothe.stages.0.label: psychic emanator soothe
LanguageData.PsychicEmanatorSoothe.stages.0.descripti: The psychic emanator makes me feel strange, but also very relaxed.
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.0.label: psychic soothe
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.0.description: It's like a calming voice at the back of my mind, soothing me, settling my nerves.
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.1.label: low psychic drone
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.1.description: It's like a scratching at the back of my mind. A voice, whispering. I can only make out a few words, and I don't like them.
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.2.label: moderate psychic drone
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.2.description: I feel like someone is always just out of sight, speaking to me. The voice changes but the message doesn't. I'm supposed to hurt people. Make it go away!
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.3.label: high psychic drone
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.3.description: The voice is unbearably loud. It's hard to concentrate. I find myself talking back to it, yelling at it. But it just keeps shouting!
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.4.label: extreme psychic drone
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.4.description: My heart pounds and I'm sweating. All I can think of is hurting and suffering and all these enemies around me. They're my nightmare, my nightmare, my nightmare...
LanguageData.Joywire.stages.0.label: joywire
LanguageData.Aurora.stages.0.label: beautiful aurora
LanguageData.DoingPassionateWork.stages.0.label: minor passion for my work
LanguageData.DoingPassionateWork.stages.1.label: burning passion for my work
LanguageData.DoingPassionateWork.stages.1.description: I love my work. I could do this all day, every day.
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.0.label: masochist in minor pain
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.0.description: Ow... Heh heh heh... I could get used to this!
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.1.label: masochist in serious pain
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.1.description: Ughhh... It hurts, but I love it! Keep it coming!
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.2.label: masochist in intense pain
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.2.description: Ouch... I think something's broken... But what an exquisite feeling!
LanguageData.MasochistPain.stages.3.label: masochist in mind-shattering pain
LanguageData.ProsthophileNoProsthetic.stages.0.label: body modder frustrated
LanguageData.ProsthophileNoProsthetic.stages.0.descri: Flesh is so limiting. I wish I had some kind of artificial body part.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.0.label: body modder pleased
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.0.description: This artificial part is cool. I want more.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.1.label: body modder quite pleased
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.1.description: Two artificial parts are better than one. I wish I had more.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.2.label: body modder delighted
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.2.description: Three artificial parts, and my weak human flesh is receding. But I still want more machine power.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.3.label: body modder enchanted
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.3.description: Four artificial body parts and I am becoming more than human. But there's still some flesh that needs replacing.
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.4.label: body modder overjoyed
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.4.description: Five artificial body parts! How could an enhanced being like me ever feel sad?
LanguageData.ProsthophileHappy.stages.5.label: machine body is complete
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.0.label: body purist squeamish
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.0.description: I hate having this unnatural thing attached to me. It feels so filthy!
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.1.label: body purist disgusted
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.1.description: Two artificial parts are sullying my natural, pure body. It makes me sick to think of it.
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.2.label: body purist violated
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.2.description: Three artificial parts violate my body's pure flesh. I shudder when I think of it... and these objects shudder with me.
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.3.label: body purist horrified
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.3.description: I have four artificial body parts; it's like I'm becoming a robot. What a horrifying sensation.
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.4.label: body purist nightmare
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.4.description: Five artificial body parts... Is there anything left of me? Or am I just a robot that thinks it's human?
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.5.label: I have become what I hate
LanguageData.ProsthophobeUnhappy.stages.5.description: I asked for the exact opposite of this!
LanguageData.BrawlerUnhappy.stages.0.label: brawler has ranged weapon
LanguageData.BrawlerUnhappy.stages.0.description: I hate shooting from a distance. I want to get up close and personal!
LanguageData.PyromaniacHappy.stages.0.label: pyromaniac has incendiary weapon
LanguageData.PyromaniacHappy.stages.0.description: It makes me think of flame and fire. I'm so happy.
LanguageData.ClothedNudist.stages.0.label: constraining clothes
LanguageData.ClothedNudist.stages.0.description: I'm a nudist but I have to wear these clothes. It's not unbearable - but I still feel constrained and uncomfortable.
LanguageData.HappyNude.stages.0.label: happily nude
LanguageData.HappyNude.stages.0.description: I'm nude and loving it! I feel so free and unconstrained and in touch with my surroundings!
LanguageData.UndergrounderIndoors.stages.0.label: undergrounder indoors
LanguageData.UndergrounderIndoors.stages.0.descriptio: I like working or simply being indoors.
LanguageData.UndergrounderUnderground.stages.0.label: underground
LanguageData.UndergrounderUnderground.stages.0.descri: I love working or simply being in the underground.
LanguageData.UndergrounderOutdoors.stages.0.label: undergrounder outdoors
LanguageData.UndergrounderOutdoors.stages.0.descripti: I don't like being outside. I want to get back to the underground.
LanguageData.NightOwlDuringTheDay.stages.0.label: night owl in daytime
LanguageData.NightOwlDuringTheDay.stages.0.descriptio: I don't like working during the day.
LanguageData.NightOwlDuringTheNight.stages.0.label: night owl at night
LanguageData.NightOwlDuringTheNight.stages.0.descript: I feel much better at night.
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.0.label: greedy for impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.0.description: I'm greedy. I want a really impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.1.label: greedy for impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.1.description: I'm greedy. My room is pathetic! I want a really impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.2.label: greedy for impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.2.description: I'm greedy. My room isn't nearly good enough. I want a really impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.3.label: greedy for impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.3.description: I'm greedy. My room isn't good enough. I want a really impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.4.label: greedy for impressive bedroom
LanguageData.Greedy.stages.4.description: I'm greedy. My room isn't quite good enough. I want a really impressive bedroom.

LanguageData.Jealous.stages.0.description: I need to have the best one!
